Detailed Description

Edge Detection Params.

struct Vps_ScEdgeDetectConfig This block is used to detect edges in image to have edge directed scaling. This block is available in high quality scaler only. This configuration is for the advanced users and for debugging. Normal applications should not use this structure. confFactor - Defines confidence factor when edge detection is disabled.

Field Documentation

UInt16 Vps_ScEdgeDetectConfig::chromaIntpThreshold

defines the difference-threshold between chroma pixels. If the difference is less than this threshold, the interpolation of chroma should be done along edge direction. Otherwise the interpolation of chroma should be done vertically.

UInt8 Vps_ScEdgeDetectConfig::deltaChromaThreshold

It defines the range for chroma soft switch based on pixel differences.

UInt8 Vps_ScEdgeDetectConfig::deltaEvThreshold

It defines the range for chroma soft switch based on edge vector.

UInt8 Vps_ScEdgeDetectConfig::deltaLumaThreshold

It defines the range of luma soft switch based on pixel difference.

UInt16 Vps_ScEdgeDetectConfig::evThreshold

If abs(edge-vector) > ev_thr then luma output is based on a soft switch between pixels along the edge and vertical.

UInt8 Vps_ScEdgeDetectConfig::gradientRange

Define the soft switch range of the edge strength test. The range is 2^gradient_thr_range.

UInt16 Vps_ScEdgeDetectConfig::gradientThreshold

Threshold for the gradient for the edge strength test.

UInt8 Vps_ScEdgeDetectConfig::minGyRange

Range for minimum Gy threshold. The range is 2^minGyRange.

UInt16 Vps_ScEdgeDetectConfig::minGyThreshold

Threshold for the soft switch of the decay for small Gy.
